Room.Name: Allisk Circle
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along the southern edge of the Allisk Circle.
Room.LongDescription: As you walk around the Allisk Circle, you notice that the center is unlike most of the other "traffic circles" you have encountered. The center is almost devoid of all life. It is covered in dead grass and wilting weeds. Regalia Way, not to be confused with Regalia Drive, runs southwest from here. Lankshire Parkway continues to the south out of the Circle.
